title: The Stylist
description: The Stylist is a fullstacks react-based social-networking applications to help women find personal style consultants in an easy and time-efficient manner.

title: Google Books Search
description: Google Books Search is a fullstacks referencing library populated by the Google Books API. Users are able to save or delete books for their own reference.

title: The Sailor Scout Memory Game
description: The Sailor Scout Memory Game is a memory game inspired by the popular 90s anime series, Sailor Moon. In this game, must click on images of the characters without any repeats.
